name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (CAS Reg. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. 64-19-7), and 1-hydroxyethylidine-1,1-diphosphonic acid (CAS Reg. 02809-21-4).
